q: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
h:
“Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.” —
Audrey Hepburn

q: Not everything that weighs you down is yours to carry.
h:
“Not everything that weighs you down is yours to carry.” —
Unknown

q: Today I begin a new life. I will greet this day with love in my heart.
h:
“Today I begin a new life. I will greet this day with love in my heart.” —
Og Mandino

q: Difficult and meaningful will always bring more satisfaction than easy and meaningless.
h:
“Difficult and meaningful will always bring more satisfaction than easy and meaningless.” —
Maxime Lagace

q: The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
h:
“The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: I succeeded by saying what everyone else is thinking.
h:
“I succeeded by saying what everyone else is thinking.” —
Joan Rivers

q: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
h:
“Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.” —
Martin Luther King, Jr.

q: Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.
h:
“Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.” —
Theodore Roosevelt
